The light and compact Suzuki Swift with its 1.2l petrol engine offers high output and exceptional fuel consumption at as little as 4.9l / km. Every detail of the third-generation Swift has been cleverly designed to make you feel at one with your new car. Book your test drive today!

This fuel efficient vehicle comes with a 5 year / 200000km warranty, 2 year / 30000km service plan and 3 year roadside assistance.

Finance Available to all Approved Buyers, Trade in's are Welcome and Delivery Nationwide.
